name: Instant Pot® Mississippi Roast
author: C.R.C.
summary: This delicious pot roast is a definite crowd pleaser!
ingredients: 3 ½ pounds beef chuck roast, cut into 3 or 4 chunks
½ (16 ounce) jar pepperoncini peppers and juice
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
directions: Pour broth into a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Place beef in the pot and sprinkle with ranch dressing mix and onion soup mix
Close and lock the pressure cooker lid
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 110 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
